arts.ttl: Esteve's Etihad nightmare: Own-goal gifts help Man City to easy win over Burnley
arts.sum: Manchester City ease to a 5-1 victory over Burnley in the Premier League on Saturday, with Maxime Esteve's two own-goals proving decisive.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 5 Burnley 1: City player ratings from the Etihad.
arts.sum: Here are the City player ratings from a game where City weren’t at their best for an hour, but then a late surge saw them pick up a vital three points. Josko Gvardiol-7/10: I thought Gvardiol was Manchester City’s best defensive player before he was taken off in the 70th minute.

arts.ttl: TWO Esteve OGs and late Haaland double as Man City hammer Burnley
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Man City’s match against Burnley in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Manchester City pile misery on Burnley and Maxime Estève after two own goals
arts.athr: Jamie Jackson at the Etihad Stadium
arts.sum: With its lightning ball-recycling that swept play left to right and then back into the area for a second Maxime Estève own goal, Manchester City’s third was a picture of their dominance under Pep Guardiola before last season’s decline. Jérémy Doku raced inside from the left and found Phil Foden, whose instant turn-and-pass to Matheus Nunes scattered Burnley. The right-back’s cross was smacked in at velocity and Oscar Bobb’s attempt rebounded off Estève and past Martin Dubravka. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Manchester City 5 Burnley 1: Match report from the Etihad.
arts.sum: Dubravka’s save fell into a dangerous area, and Maxime Estève deflected the ball into his own net to give Manchester City the lead. Doku was played in by Erling Haaland, and the Belgian international made a surging run into the Burnley penalty area.

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland brace and two Maxime Esteve own goals help Man City thump Burnley
arts.sum: Jaidon Anthony had cancelled out an early opener off Esteve.

arts.ttl: Late Haaland brace helps Man City to big win over Burnley
arts.sum: Maxime Esteve scored two own goals before a late Erling Haaland double took Manchester City to a 5-1 win over Burnley at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Premier League LIVE: Four games under way after Brentford beat Man Utd, plus Graham Potter sacking reaction
arts.sum: Follow live text commentary of four games in the Premier League after Brentford beat Manchester United, plus reaction as Graham Potter is sacked by West Ham.

arts.ttl: Man City vs. Burnley confirmed XIs: Haaland decision made as Guardiola makes six changes
arts.sum: Manchester City and Burnley confirm their starting lineups for this afternoon’s Premier League clash at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Why isn't Man City vs Burnley on TV? Kick-off time and live stream information
arts.sum: How to watch Manchester City vs Burnley in the Premier League as Pep Guardiola's side chase a much-needed three points against the newly promoted Clarets
